name: Atomic Muse
description:
The collage describes the technique and the resulting artwork, in which pieces of paper, photographs, fabric, and other ephemeral things are laid out and glued onto a support surface.
Around the 90's I used to do this with cropped magazines...
With the advent of the digital age, collages started to be made digitally too, and it was using this technique that I conceived this artwork.
Enjoy...
